Citation

Hyndman RJ (2017). forecast: Forecasting functions for time series and linear models. R package version 8.2, http://github.com/robjhyndman/forecast. 

@Manual{,
  title = {{forecast}: Forecasting functions for time series and linear models},
  author = {Rob J Hyndman},
  year = {2017},
  note = {R package version 8.2},
  url = {http://github.com/robjhyndman/forecast},
}

Hyndman RJ and Khandakar Y (2008). “Automatic time series forecasting: the forecast package for R.” Journal of Statistical Software, 26(3), pp. 1–22. http://www.jstatsoft.org/article/view/v027i03. 

@Article{,
